com.taliter.fiscal.port

Interface FiscalPort

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoggerFiscalPort, RXTXFiscalPort, SerialFiscalPort

    public interface FiscalPort
    A bidirectional stream channel.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close the port.
      void flushAndWait()
      Flush the output stream and wait until output is done.
      int getBaudRate()
      Get the baud rate.
      java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
      Get the input stream.
      java.io.OutputStream getOutputStream()
      Get the output stream.
      int getTimeout()
      Get the receive timeout.
      boolean isOpen()
      Returns true if the port is open.

      Open the port.

      Set the receive timeout.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Open the port.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • close

        void close()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Close the port. Does nothing if already closed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • isOpen

        boolean isOpen()
        Returns true if the port is open.

      • setTimeout

        void setTimeout(int ms)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the receive timeout. The port must be open. -1 means no timeout (default after open()).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getTimeout

        int getTimeout()
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Get the receive timeout. The port must be open. -1 means no timeout (default after open()).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setBaudRate

        void setBaudRate(int baudRate)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the baud rate. The port may be open or closed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if baud rates are not applicable to this type of port.
        java.lang.Exception

      • getBaudRate

        int getBaudRate()
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Get the baud rate. The port may be open or closed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if baud rates are not applicable to this type of port.
        java.lang.Exception

      • getInputStream

        java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Get the input stream. The port must be open.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getOutputStream

        java.io.OutputStream getOutputStream()
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Get the output stream. The port must be open.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • flushAndWait

        void flushAndWait()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Flush the output stream and wait until output is done.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
